title.narrative: Working through the European Union to build the capacity and preparedness of the Ministry of Public Works to Liberia in road maintenance and infrastructure development.

description.narrative: This activity (Working through the European Union to build the capacity and preparedness of the Ministry of Public Works to Liberia in road maintenance and infrastructure development.) is a component of Liberia Road Maintenance EU reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Multilateral organisation' and a budget of £3,100,000. This component benefits Liberia, and works in the following sector(s): Road transport, Urban development and management. , with the following implementing partners: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Cooperation and Development. The start date is 01-04-2013 and the end date is 31-03-2015.

participating-org.narrative: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Cooperation and Development

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
